Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/30th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale, 26th, & Pulaski  due to street blockage near Pulaski/30th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale, 26th, & Pulaski  due to street blockage near Pulaski/30th.

Allow extra travel time.
